Cyberwolf, do you mind if Starlight kills Prebon?


::Recklessa/Astral/Starlight::

Recklessa's eyes widen as Motormaster heads up toward her. She 
increases power to her jetpack, flying upwards at a high speed and 
firing missiles down at Motormaster.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral aims his gun up, firing two dozen rapid shots at Motormaster.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Starlight looks down as Prebon's body floats up in stasis lock. She 
smiles.

"Zardus, one of the attackers has just surfaced in stasis lock, what 
do you want to have done with him?" She says into her comm.

"Terminate him," Zardus's voice replies. Starlight smiles, flying 
down toward Prebon and aiming her charge launcher.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> As two more missiles strike his durable hide Motormaster growls in 
a fury.
> If he wasnt upset before he certainly is now. With a swift motion he
> transforms, now clutching a sword in his left hand, the top of his 
head and
> side of his left arm smoking incredibaly, where the armor was hit 
from his
> foes. He levitates from the ground towards the airborn Recklessa, 
not much
> of an expression in his doom stricken eyes. "You my friend," he 
starts to
> boom, his voice different from before, much more hollow, and devoid 
of
> kidness, "are quite a pain in the tailpipe" flying towards his 
target with
> murderous intent in his eyes.
